ARCHIVE MATERIALS

[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_button button_text="Webinar Recording" main_style="style-2" undefined="" box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" hover_box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" tooltip_text="Click to Open in New Tab" buttom_link_src="url:https%3A%2F%2Fcommunity.aaii.com%2FHigherLogic%2FSystem%2FDownloadDocumentFile.ashx%3FDocumentFileKey%3D8dc99c71-fa92-ebc6-1f48-1b6838682f20%26forceDialog%3D0|title:May%202025%20Webinar%20ARCHIVE%20PT%201|target:%20_blank|" title_font_options="font_size:20"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]Steve Chen is the Founder and CEO of Boldin, formerly NewRetirement, a holistic financial planning platform that includes software, classes, coaching, and expert advice, helping millions of people improve their financial wellness. The company has been recognized as the best retirement solution by Forbes and the American Association of Individual Investors (AAII). Before founding Boldin, Steve built venture-backed companies in education and financial services, and worked with organizations such as Charles Schwab, Dimensional Fund Advisors, and Fidelity. He holds a degree in Systems Engineering from Boston University and hosts a podcast where he interviews thought leaders in the financial industry.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="40" screen_tablet_spacer_size="30" screen_mobile_spacer_size="20"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="40" screen_tablet_spacer_size="30" screen_mobile_spacer_size="20"][dfd_heading subtitle="" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h2" subtitle_font_options="tag:div"]Possibilities and Probabilities: Stress Testing Your Retirement Plans for Risks and Opportunities[/dfd_heading][vc_column_text]
Retirement isn’t a fixed path—it’s a range of outcomes shaped by markets, personal values, health, and life choices. This session shows you how to optimize your financial plan against both risks and opportunities using your own goals and resources. You’ll walk away with a clearer understanding of your retirement possibilities—and the levers you can pull to improve your odds of success.
[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]
Attend this talk and learn...
[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text]

ARCHIVE MATERIALS

[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_button button_text="Webinar Recording" main_style="style-2" undefined="" box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" hover_box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" tooltip_text="Click to Open in New Tab" buttom_link_src="url:https%3A%2F%2Fcommunity.aaii.com%2FHigherLogic%2FSystem%2FDownloadDocumentFile.ashx%3FDocumentFileKey%3D45dc8cda-cc53-7102-7042-c55b4a5b0d87%26forceDialog%3D0|title:May%202025%20Webinar%20ARCHIVE%20PT%202|target:%20_blank|" title_font_options="font_size:20"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]Alex Ebkarian is COO and co-founder of Allegiance Gold, a leading full-service physical precious metals dealer. With over 20 years of experience in investment and financial services, Alex’s passion for gold began as a child growing up in Lebanon. He witnessed firsthand gold’s role as a safeguard during hyperinflation, and how it preserved its value and protected wealth during the Great Recession. Since 2017, Allegiance Gold has built a reputation for excellence through education, transparency and strong relationships, earning an A+ rating from the Better Business Bureau (BBB).[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="40" screen_tablet_spacer_size="30" screen_mobile_spacer_size="20"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="40" screen_tablet_spacer_size="30" screen_mobile_spacer_size="20"][dfd_heading subtitle="" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h2" subtitle_font_options="tag:div"]Why Gold is in a Secular Bull Market—5 Trends Fueling Its Rise[/dfd_heading][vc_column_text]Alex Ebkarian will focus on 5 key reasons investors should own gold today, including how gold fared under Trump 1.0, how Trump 2.0 policies affect precious metals, and why gold may appreciate at a 15% annual compound rate over the long term. He will address the different asset classes of gold (stocks, ETFs, physical gold), the pros and cons of each, and how duration of outlook (ROI) helps to determine suitability for investors, plus why long-term ownership-either within an IRA or outside- is a highly desirable investment providing various protections and benefits.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]
Attend this talk and learn to...
[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" list_fields="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Understand%20the%20dynamics%20of%20the%20gold%20market%2C%20the%20geopolitical%20and%20economic%20factors%20fueling%20its%20rise%2C%20and%20why%20gold%20becomes%20a%20worthy%20long-term%20investment%20in%20diversified%20portfolios.%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Have%20a%20clearer%20understanding%20of%20different%20asset%20classes%20of%20gold%2C%20the%20varying%20degrees%20of%20risk%2C%20volatility%20and%20time%20duration%20involved%2C%20and%20how%20to%20determine%20which%20asset%20class%20suits%20you%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Understand%20the%20concept%20of%20owning%20vs.%20renting%20gold%2C%20and%20whether%20you%20should%20start%20by%20investing%20in%20coins%20or%20bars%20if%20you%20choose%20ownership%22%7D%5D" item.excerpt:encoded: Financial Education meeting information that focuses on the broad overview of basic individual investing in today's market.
